meanings.sent1: The dude walked down the street.

meanings.definition: A group of people, especially friends
meanings.sent1: Hey dudes, let's go to the movies!
meanings.sent2: The dudes were having a great time at the party.
meanings.sent3: The group of dudes laughed loudly at the joke.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship made them a solid group of dudes.
meanings.sent5: The dudes shared many memories together.

meanings.definition: To dress or style in a trendy or fashionable way
meanings.sent1: She dudes up in the latest fashion trends.
meanings.sent2: They always dudes up for the fancy events.
meanings.sent3: He decided to dudes up for the concert.
meanings.sent4: Her outfit really dudes up her look.
meanings.sent5: Duding up for the occasion made her feel confident.
